channel.title: Software licenses in plain English
channel.description:
Great site that allows you to search for a software license (Apache, MIT, GPL, etc), and quickly determine what you can, cannot, and must do when you use software or a library that's under that license. Also helpful when deciding on a license under which to release your own products.
[https://tldrlegal.com/][1]
[1]: https://tldrlegal.com/

item.title: Software licenses in plain English
item.dc:creator: mattm
item.description:
Nice site, thanks @andrey . There’s a similar site people might find useful if they’re trying to figure out what license to use: http://choosealicense.com/

It’s run by Github.

Read full topic
